comments.body: I'm worried that this method is brittle. Might be worth looking for an agreed upon validator somewhere in the rest of the codebase. e.g. What does RBAC do to validate those fields?

liggitt saies that RBAC doesn't do validation in kube-apiserver.
But I fount this:
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/staging/src/k8s.io/apiserver/pkg/audit/policy/checker.go#L112
